data.title: Rhino AM32 Small Dual Crawler ESC 40A Kits For MOA
data.meta_description: Shop a wide range of Ready to Fly or RTF drones, multirotors and quadcopters at the lowest prices. Buy RTF drones online at Balalabox for worldwide shipping.
data.text:
Default Motor KV Settings: 2340KV

Manual:

GUI settings:

Throttle range calibration video:

RhinoESC Small Dual ESC 40A Kits: one ESC for the front axle and one for the rear!

This ESC preloaded AM32 custom firmware. It's optimized for crawler and makes your car run super smooth and quiet, but it is also suitable for a variety of 1/10 scale or smaller cars. A built-in adjustable four voltage BEC with a maximum current 3A. In addition.

All wires are pre-soldered.

Feature

AM32 custom firmware

Sinewave startup allows the motor smoothly at ultra-low speeds Variable drive frequency

Low voltage, throttle loss and stalled rotor protection

High-performance 32-bit MCU

Specs

Product Num.: A3110

Battery: 2~4S Lipo

Current: 40A cont.

BEC: max 3A, output 5.2~8.2V adjustable by DIP switch

Waterproof: ESC not supported / e-switch supported

FAN: not supported

Connectors: not include

Wires: battery 16AWGx100mm, output 16AWGx100mm, signal 200mm

Weight: 43g/pcs

Package included:

1 Set Daul 40A

1 x USB Link

We have hold the red wire on bottom ESC plug, if you want to use it alone in the future, just put the red wire into the plug.
